      • sendMsg

        void sendMsg(java.lang.String from,
             java.lang.String msg,
             java.lang.String IP)
        Send a simulated message
        Parameters:
        from - the IP address of the sending robot
        msg - the contents of the message. The contents should be provided as they would be to the socket connection in a non-simulated robot.
        IP - the IP address the message will be sent to. This may be the broadcast IP address or the IP address of a single robot

        java.lang.String getStatistics()
